org.dejava.service.accesscontrol.model

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dejava.component.ejb.entity.AbstractIdentifiedEntity
      • org.dejava.service.accesscontrol.model.User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    @Entity
public class User
extends org.dejava.component.ejb.entity.AbstractIdentifiedEntity
    Represents a system user.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getPrincipal

        public <ConcretePrincipal extends Principal> ConcretePrincipal getPrincipal(Class<ConcretePrincipal> principalType)
        Gets the principal with the given type (there should not be more than an object for given type).
        Type Parameters:
        ConcretePrincipal - A concrete principal type.
        Parameters:
        principalType - The type for the principal being searched.
        Returns:
        The principal with the given type (there should not be more than an object for given type).
